numpy
pandas
scikit-learn
joblib

matplotlib
seaborn

torch

transformers

# Gradient boosting
xgboost
lightgbm

# Interpretability
shap

# FastAPI-based model deployment
fastapi
uvicorn

# YAML config
pyyaml

# Time series modeling
prophet

# System introspection
psutil
